title: Use stored credentials in hostname for connexion using HTTP/HTTPs protocol
author: Shavo26
body_snippet:
Some http/https site can be logged on using a login/password in the url.
If you write it in clear directly in the hostname, of course it works.
What should be available is to use the variables %username% and %password% (stored just below) directly in the hostname.
It would allow to hide the credentials, to inheritate it, etc...

## Expected Behavior
For http and https protocol, when using %username% and %password% variable in a hostname adress, mRemote use the stored credentials.
